casebody.data:
ALLSTATE INSURANCE COMPANY, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
AUTO CLUB INSURANCE ASSOCIATION, Defendant-Appellant. Allstate Insurance Company, Plaintiff,
v.
Marquise Dionne Harris, Defendant. SC: 156773
COA: 338895 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 3, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the October 26, 2017 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should now be reviewed by this Court.
